sysHostname.name: sysHostname
sysHostname.description: This OID contains the full name of the host on network

sysOs.name: sysOs
sysOs.description: This OID contains the textual inforamtions about the op√©rating system

ifTable.name: ifTable
ifTable.description: A table contains a list of interface. The number of interfaces is given by the pre-OID

ifEntry.name: ifEntry
ifEntry.description: Represents a entry as object of the table containing all interfaces of system

ifIndex.name: ifIndex
ifIndex.description: It represents a index of an entry (interface) of the table. This number is in range between 1 to ifNumber

ifDescription.name: ifDescription
ifDescription.description: A textual description of the interface (including constructor, id and reference)

ifPhysAddress.name: ifPhysAddress
ifPhysAddress.description: A value of physical address on NIC

ifAddress.name: ifAddress
ifAddress.description: A value of address on local network

mProcessorNumber.name: mProcessorNumber
mProcessorNumber.description: A number that contains the number of processor available on the system

mProcessorTable.name: mProcessorTable
mProcessorTable.description: A table contains all informations about the processor

mProcessorEntry.name: mProcessorEntry
mProcessorEntry.description: This object represents a entry of the table of processor

mProcessorIndex.name: mProcessorIndex
mProcessorIndex.description: A unique number to identifier the processor in the table

mProcessorRef.name: mProcessorRef
mProcessorRef.description: The textual reference of the processor (including constructor,model,version,other...)

mProcessorCore.name: mProcessorCore
mProcessorCore.description: A number contains the number of processor cores

mProcessorVCore.name: mProcessorVCore
mProcessorVCore.description: A number contains the number of virtual core (thread) making up the processor

mProcessorFreq.name: mProcessorFreq
mProcessorFreq.description: The base frequency of the processor

mDiskNumber.name: mDiskNumber
mDiskNumber.description: A number that contains the number of disk available on the system

mDiskTable.name: mDiskTable
mDiskTable.description: A Table that contains all disk installed on machine

mDiskEntry.name: mDiskEntry
mDiskEntry.description: Represents an entry in the table of disk

mDiskIndex.name: mDiskIndex
mDiskIndex.description: A number to identify the unique way a entry in the disk table

mDiskRef.name: mDiskRef
mDiskRef.description: The reference of disk includind the constructor, the model and other informations about the disk

mDiskAvailable.name: mDiskAvailable
mDiskAvailable.description: The number that refer to the storage still available

mDiskUsed.name: mDiskUsed
mDiskUsed.description: The number that refer to the storage used

mVStorageNumber.name: mVStorageNumber
mVStorageNumber.description: A number that contains the number of volatile storage available on the system

mVStorageTable.name: mVStorageTable
mVStorageTable.description: A Table that contains all volatile storage such as RAM installed on machine

mVStorageEntry.name: mVStorageEntry
mVStorageEntry.description: Represents an entry in the table of disk

mVStorageIndex.name: mVStorageIndex
mVStorageIndex.description: A number to identify the unique way a entry in the volatile storage table

mVStorageRef.name: mVStorageRef
mVStorageRef.description: The reference of the volatile storage can include the constructor, the model and other informations about this storage

mVStorageAvailable.name: mVStorageAvailable
mVStorageAvailable.description: This number contains the entire volatile storage available (such as available RAM in GB)

mVStorageFreq.name: mVStorageFreq
mVStorageFreq.description: This number refer to the frequency of the volatile storage (in MHz)

mVStorageLatency.name: mVStorageLatency
mVStorageLatency.description: This number refer to the latency of the volatile storage (in MHz)

sNumber.name: sNumber
sNumber.description: A number that contains the number of service running on the system

sTable.name: sTable
sTable.description: A table contains a list of service offered by the system

sEntry.name: sEntry
sEntry.description: An object representing an antry of the service table

sIndex.name: sIndex
sIndex.description: A unique identifier to identify the entry in the table

sName.name: sName
sName.description: A more user-friendly name for the service

sDescription.name: sDescription
sDescription.description: This OID provide more informations about the service

sPort.name: sPort
sPort.description: This chaine provide all port used by the service (empty if the service don't use any port)
